remarks: A lemma to assist theorems of ` || ` with one antecedent.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
statement:
dvds1lem.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( J e. ZZ /\ K e. ZZ ) ) $.
dvds1lem.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) ) $.
dvds1lem.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ZZ ) -> Z e. ZZ ) $.
dvds1lem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ZZ ) -> ( ( x x. J ) = K -> ( Z x. M ) = N ) ) $.
dvds1lem $p |- ( ph -> ( J || K -> M || N ) ) $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
$d M x $.
$d N x $.
$d ph x $.
